channel.title: 1.7 on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in 1.7 on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Checklist
item.description: SPECIFICATIONS CHECKLIST As a contributor, I want to know how to write complete specifications. As a core team member, I want to deliver the most completed specifications in order to have accurate and qualitative development. Most of the time, each file corresponds to a specific page or a tab, whether it comes from the back office, the front office, or a module. It might happen to have a cross-functional feature to specify, that defines wide behaviors and impacts many different pages.
Specification of forms Context: Rule to be applied after the migration of a from or creation of a new form Mandatory fields: Any mandatory string fields do not accept only spaces as a value.
